name: HirePulse
overview:
HirePulse offers premium advertising for contractors, consultants, freelancers and small business owners.

HirePulse is a great looking, cost-effective way to promote your business online. You’ll be able to provide in-depth information about your business and specify the members of your team to enhance your online presence dramatically. Connect with your existing social network profiles to keep information up-to-date and tell customers more about yourself.

HirePulse connects service providers with clients in many different ways. Clients will be able to send you and inquiry directly from your advertisement; you’ll receive an email with their contact details instantly. Use our exclusive online chat functionality to talk to customers in real-time; all you need to do is sign in to the site and let the work find you.

We offer a completely free membership which includes a business profile and one complementary individual for your team. If you choose to upgrade you’ll be able to add more team members as well as contact information for your business including a website URL, a phone number, an email address and a map of your location.
